ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the Modifiers API to create Text, Line, Box, LineArrow and Custom Annotations dynamically.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Using the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/Editing%20and%20Interacting%20with%20Annotations.html']AnnotationCreationModifier[/url] you can give your users the ability to create annotations dynamically via mouse-clicks.
[b][i]Tips![/i][/b]
To create [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20TextAnnotation%20Type.html']TextAnnotations[/url], [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20AxisMarkerAnnotation%20Type.html']AxisMarkerAnnotations[/url], [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20CustomAnnotation%20Type.html']CustomAnnotations[/url], - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20HorizontalLineAnnotation%20Type.html']HorizontalLineAnnotations[/url] and - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20VerticalLineAnnotation%20Type.html']VerticalLineAnnotations[/url], simply click once.
To create [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20BoxAnnotation%20Type.html']BoxAnnotations[/url], [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20LineAnnotation%20Type.html']LineAnnotations[/url] and [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20LineArrowAnnotation%20Type.html']LineArrowAnnotations[/url] click and drag.
After creating and selecting an annotation, you can drag, resize and delete it.
